cookingTips: Wash and thoroughly dry kale; excess moisture prevents crisping
Remove thick stems and tear into chip-sized pieces for uniform cooking
Toss lightly with oil (less is more) to avoid greasy chips; spread in single layer for even crisping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain why drying kale is critical, teach proper tearing technique, and show how minimal oil creates maximum crispiness.
